directions: Mix cream cheese, onion soup mix, garlic, and granulated garlic together in a bowl; add more granulated garlic if desired. Stir sour cream into dip for a thinner consistency. Refrigerate until serving time.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
1 tablespoon granulated garlic, or more to taste
title: Easy Onion Garlic Spread
